feed.title: Gatus Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(maintenance): Import time/tzdata to support timezones by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/849

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.12.0...v5.12.1

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(alerting): Implement Zulip alerts by @mehdibo in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/845
  • feat(alerting): Add optional field alerting.mattermost.channel by @ggerrit in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/823
  • feat(alerting): custom alert support endpoint errors by @raojinlin in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/844
  • feat(alerting): alert teams add client insecure option by @raojinlin in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/864
  • feat(alerting): add email and click action to ntfy provider by @stendler in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/778
  • feat(alerting): Implement new Teams Workflow alert by @JamesHillyard in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/847
  • docs: change the url of the helm chart to your repo by @chrootlogin in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/878
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.24.0 to 0.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/857
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.31.1 to 1.33.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/860
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.26.0 to 0.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/861
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/wcharczuk/go-chart/v2 from 2.1.1 to 2.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/862
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/miekg/dns from 1.1.61 to 1.1.62 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/866
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.19.1 to 1.20.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/867
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/valyala/fasthttp from 1.54.0 to 1.56.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/869
  • chore(deps): bump codecov/codecov-action from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/873

New Contributors

  • @mehdibo made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/845
  • @ggerrit made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/823
  • @raojinlin made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/844
  • @stendler made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/778
  • @chrootlogin made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/878
  • @JamesHillyard made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/847

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.12.1...v5.13.0

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(alerting): Add missing support for default-alert on teams-workflows by @liamjones-pw in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/883
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.10.0 to 3.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/870
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.52.4 to 2.52.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/888
  • docs: Fix typo in README by @d7415 in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/885

New Contributors

  • @liamjones-pw made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/883
  • @d7415 made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/885

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.13.0...v5.13.1

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(alerting): Implement alert-level provider overrides by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/929
  • feat(alerting): Update Adaptive Cards design for teams-workflows by @Tim-orius in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/903
  • feat(alerting): Add overrides for Ntfy provider by @bishtawi in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/918
  • feat(alerting): Pushover priority on resolved by @onedr0p in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/879
  • feat(client): Add support for PTR DNS records by @d7415 in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/886
  • feat(logging): Allow configuring logging verbosity level by @garyhodgson in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/872
  • fix(logging): Replace log-level parameter by GATUS_LOG_LEVEL env var by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/895
  • docs: Change protocol backslash (\\) to forwardslash (//) in README.md by @PhilipWhiteside in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/933
  • docs: Fix typo by @chkpwd in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/931

New Contributors

  • @onedr0p made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/879
  • @garyhodgson made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/872
  • @Tim-orius made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/903
  • @bishtawi made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/918
  • @PhilipWhiteside made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/933
  • @chkpwd made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/931

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.13.1...v5.14.0

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(ui): Implement Custom CSS configuration by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/943
  • feat(alerting): Add condition results to Pushover by @mmed in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/945
  • feat(api): Expose uptime data as text via API by @JamesHillyard in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/758
  • chore(deps): bump google.golang.org/api from 0.209.0 to 0.214.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/939
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/valyala/fasthttp from 1.56.0 to 1.58.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/940
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.20.4 to 1.20.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/923
  • docs: Fix typo in README by @eltociear in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/946
  • test(client): add test for insecure flag by @pnikonowicz in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/942

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/946
  • @pnikonowicz made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/942
  • @mmed made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/945

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.14.0...v5.15.0
